1.title: Three Stories, One Bear
1.plot: Michigan U.S.A. conservation officers investigate a bear killed during the season's opening weekend; a suspicious bag of trash at a state park; the reason why every successful bear hunter has to turn in a tooth from his kill.

2.title: Elevated Charges
2.plot: It's a late night for two Michigan U.S.A. conservation officers as an investigation into a hunting blind on federal property turns into much more. The area is also home to a once nearly extinct bird that is now making a comeback.

12.title: Kings Hill
12.plot: Montana - Warden Bryan Golie investigates a call of shots fired on private property during the big game season and is in for one long night.

13.title: Watching Wall
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Never Ending Day
1.plot: The Warden's day starts early with an opportunity to capture a convicted game violator who has dodged the law for over 3 years. But just as one case closes another begins - forcing them to work late into the night.

2.title: Angry Like a Moose
2.plot: Region 4 Wardens are called in to round up a 1000 pound bully. But this youngster is not leaving the safety of his home. The Wardens turn to drastic measures to secure the situation.

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Failure to Tag
4.plot: Birds, bucks and missing licenses. This week the Wardens watch a clear violation take place in Region 5. Property lines are crossed in pursuit of upland game and a license check comes up empty.

5.title: Warden's Instinct
5.plot: There is often a fine line between false information and the truth. Veteran Region 5 wardens use their sixth to bring game violators to justice.

6.title: Fourth Dimension
6.plot: Fourth of July in Montana's Flathead Lake is where the party is at. But with the heat tempers flare and the free flowing alcohol combines to make a dangerous situation.

7.title: Behind the Shed
7.plot: When the game ranges are opened up for Antler Shed Hunting its all hands on deck for the Montana Game Wardens. Reports of Bears, Mountain Lions and lost hunters keep the wardens busy.

8.title: Fun in the Sun
8.plot: When Jet skis get too close to boats things can turn dangerous. And Warden Bryan Golie questions an angler in search for the truth.

9.title: Above and Beyond
9.plot: Wardens often go the extra mile to investigate a report of illegal activity, help a hunter or protect landowner rights. This week Wardens go that extra mile with an unexpected outcome.

10.title: Thrill Kill
10.plot: In 2012, the small community of Whitefish, Montana was shocked by the useless killing of over 20 deer. Region 1 Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

11.title: Invasive Species
11.plot: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP. But when AIS check stations are set up in Region 1 and 3 it's up to the Wardens to educate the public.

12.title: Axel and Chains
12.plot: When Wardens respond to a call sometimes getting there is most of the battle. And we pay tribute to an honorary warden that will truly be missed.

13.title: Stolen Future
13.plot: Montana Game Wardens have their hands full with headless deer, trophy bull elk being poached and illegally tagged deer. But the Future of hunting is bright with a new batch of hunters.

14.title: Night Chase
14.plot: With a massive Winter storm bearing down on Northern Montana Wardens aren't backing off. Wardens catch one guy in a web of lies at a check station while miles away they chase down a decoy shooter that refuses to give up.

1.title: Law Dodgers
1.plot: Montana Region 4 warden Bryan Golie chases down hunters that dodged a game-check station. A nearly-four-hour investigation reveals exactly what they were hiding.

2.title: Crying Shame
2.plot: Montana U.S.A. Region 5 Warden Nick Taylor is in the crosshairs when a hunter points a gun directly at him. In Region 2, Wardens find a huntress with a secret she is hiding.

3.title: Illegal Possession
3.plot: Montana U.S.A. Region 3 Wardens chase down a check station runner only to find the hunters have shot a deer, but what and where is the question?

4.title: Under Fire
4.plot: The drought conditions in Montana U.S.A. threaten to close down hunting and fishing in the Treasure State. But, dead fish and restrictions are the least of the Wardens worries when the bears come to town.

5.title: False Witness
5.plot: Block Management is one of the keys to great hunting in Montana U.S.A. but the rules are set. If you are going to break them, the Wardens will be there to hold you accountable.

6.title: Frozen Fire
6.plot: When a report of an illegal buck surfaces, Warden Joe Kambic goes to work to find the shooters. Things heat up for Warden Rick Smauch when he responds to a fire; and Bryan Golie fights the winter weather just to patrol his area.

7.title: River Rescue
7.plot: Drownings happen every Summer on the lakes and rivers of Montana U.S.A. Region 1 Warden Chris Crane steps in to save a person in a kayak, while Region 2 Wardens catch friends fishing in the wrong spot.

8.title: Death Valley
8.plot: Something is killing deer in the Missoula Valley of Montana U.S.A. and it has Fish, Wildlife and Parks working overtime to find the culprit.

9.title: Careless Endeavors
9.plot: Opening weekend mayhem has Wardens running from one call to the next. But not all violations are negligence.

10.title: Grey Ghost
10.plot: Wardens get a tip about a grey pickup truck with hunters shooting a deer at night, but even joining forces they have a tough time tracking down the Grey Ghost.

11.title: Dump Site
11.plot: Montana U.S.A. Region 4 Wardens find a deer in the dumpster, multiple deer dumped alongside the road and a deer left by a trespasser. It's all in a long day's work.

12.title: Hidden Truth
12.plot: When Wardens stop a truck on the first of November with Christmas trees in the back they know something is being hidden. Most likely the truth.

13.title: Back Country Patrol
13.plot: Wardens do way more than just drive around in trucks and check licenses. This week the region one wardens go off the grid to protect the natural resources of Montana U.S.A.

14.title: Double Kill
14.plot: Montana U.S.A. Region 5 has a rash of illegal elk kills and it's up to the Wardens to investigate the double kills.

15.title: Hot Mess
15.plot: Wardens gear up for the last week of the season. The pressure is on, putting the Wardens right in the middle of a hot mess.

16.title: Long Day
16.plot: When Elk start to migrate, the days get long. Wardens keep an eye on the herd and find that at night it really gets weird.

17.title: Bad Decisions
17.plot: Ethical hunters make the right decisions every day. This week, Wardens find themselves confronted with bad decisions.

18.title: Fly By
18.plot: Wardens set up a check station in Montana U.S.A. Region 5. When the hunters decide to run it, the chase is on.

19.title: Road Warrior
19.plot: Wardens set up a decoy to stop road hunting in Montana U.S.A. Region 7. It's not long before they catch a shooter.

20.title: Last Hurrah
20.plot: A veteran warden from Region 5 in Montana works his last season.

imdb.plot outline: When your job is protecting our most precious natural resources in some of the nation's most remote areas, there is rarely a dull moment. Show chronicles the lives of conservation officers in America, with the 2011 season focusing on the great state of Montana. Watch as these brave men and women defend public lands from poachers and other environmental hazards, brave treacherous whitewater rapids and embark on intense snowmobile trails in the remote grizzly bear country. It's all in a day's work for these protectors of the great outdoors.
